directions: Beat egg yolks, celery, yogurt, Anaheim pepper, mayonnaise, mustard, Buffalo wing sauce, garlic salt, onion powder, black pepper, and paprika together in a bowl with a fork until mixture is creamy and smooth. Mix in Cheddar cheese.
Place egg white halves on a platter. Spoon egg yolk mixture evenly into egg white halves.
ingredients: 8 hard-boiled eggs, halved lengthwise with yolks and whites separated
1 tablespoon hot Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's® REDHOT Buffalo Wing Sauce), or to taste
2 tablespoons finely grated Cheddar cheese, or more to taste
title: Buffalo Deviled Eggs
